articles.title: Catch the Quadrantid Fireballs: A January Sky Spectacle With Moon and Planet Pairings - SciTechDaily
articles.description: What are some skywatching highlights in January 2024? The year kicks off with the Quadrantid meteors, and some great Moon-planet pairings. Plus, did you know the stars shift in the sky by four minutes each day? https://youtu.be/jjctqlG78wA WHAT TO LOOK FOR: M…
